Module kivakit.core

Package com.telenav.kivakit.core.test

package com.telenav.kivakit.core.test
  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    QuickTest
    JUnit category for marking slow tests with @Category annotation.
    SlowTest
    JUnit category for marking slow tests with @Category annotation.
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    JUnitFailureReporter
    A FailureReporter that causes a JUnit test failure.
    RandomValueFactory
    Utility class for tests used to create random values.
    UnitTest
    This is the base test class for all unit tests.
    UnitTestWatcher
    A JUnit test watcher that prints out any random seed value when a random test fails so that the failure can be reproduced with RandomValueFactory.seed(long).
  • Enum Summary
    Enum
    Description
    UnitTest.Repeats
    Values that allow or disallow repeats in random sequences
